description: Uses an LLM to generate structured data. Ideal for extraction and consistency.

inputs.name: llm
inputs.info: The language model to use to generate the structured output.

inputs.name: input_value
inputs.info: The input message to the language model.

inputs.name: system_prompt
inputs.info: The instructions to the language model for formatting the output.
inputs.value: You are an AI that extracts structured JSON objects from unstructured text. Use a predefined schema with expected types (str, int, float, bool, dict). Extract ALL relevant instances that match the schema - if multiple patterns exist, capture them all. Fill missing or ambiguous values with defaults: null for missing values. Remove exact duplicates but keep variations that have different field values. Always return valid JSON in the expected format, never throw errors. If multiple objects can be extracted, return them all in the structured format.
inputs.default: You are an AI that extracts structured JSON objects from unstructured text. Use a predefined schema with expected types (str, int, float, bool, dict). Extract ALL relevant instances that match the schema - if multiple patterns exist, capture them all. Fill missing or ambiguous values with defaults: null for missing values. Remove exact duplicates but keep variations that have different field values. Always return valid JSON in the expected format, never throw errors. If multiple objects can be extracted, return them all in the structured format.

inputs.name: schema_name
inputs.info: Provide a name for the output data schema.

inputs.name: output_schema
inputs.info: Define the structure and data types for the model's output.

table_schema.name: name
table_schema.description: Specify the name of the output field.

table_schema.name: description
table_schema.description: Describe the purpose of the output field.

table_schema.name: type
table_schema.description: Indicate the data type of the output field (e.g., str, int, float, bool, dict).

table_schema.name: multiple
table_schema.description: Set to True if this output field should be a list of the specified type.
